alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Iberia; Lafayette; St. Landry; Upper St. Martin; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 9:44PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Iberia, Lafayette, southern Acadia, northeastern Vermilion, St. Martin and southeastern St. Landry Parishes through 1030 PM CDT... At 944 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Butte La Rose to near Lyons Point. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, New Iberia, Crowley, Abbeville, Catahoula, Scott, Breaux Bridge, Rayne, Carencro, St. Martinville, Kaplan, Arnaudville, Mermentau, Broussard, Youngsville, Erath, Delcambre, Duson, Henderson and Maurice. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 67 and 126. Interstate 49 between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central and southwestern Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: Acadia; Iberia; Lafayette; St. Landry; Upper St. Martin; Vermilion
